OrgName.entry: NORTHERN GENERAL HOSPITAL LEAGUE OF FRIENDS

AltName.entry: LEAGUE OF HOSPITAL FRIENDS SHEFFIELD TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST NORTHERN GENERAL HOSPITAL

Desc.entry: A registered charity who's volunteers raise funds to provide additional services, facilities and equipment for patients, visitors and staff within Sheffield teaching Hospitals Foundation Trust. The League raises money through their snack bars, shop and trolley service on the wards as well as various charity events. Volunteers welcome.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Tues in the month at 1pm (Executive Committee)
